SUMMARY:
Modular initramfs system
initramfs support for easy execution of applications
initramfs support for mdev
initramfs support for udev
initramfs support for ext4/ext3/ext2 filesystems
initramfs support for locating and mounting the root partition via nfs
initramfs support for locating and mounting the root partition
initramfs dynamic debug support
initramfs lvm rootfs support
SRC_URI: file://init            file://exec            file://nfsrootfs            file://rootfs            file://finish            file://mdev            file://udev            file://e2fs            file://debug            file://lvm 
PACKAGES: ${PN}-base             initramfs-module-exec             initramfs-module-mdev             initramfs-module-udev             initramfs-module-e2fs             initramfs-module-nfsrootfs             initramfs-module-rootfs             initramfs-module-debug             initramfs-module-lvm 
